Sathick Batcha S is a Software Developer with over 6 years of professional experience in building high-performance web and mobile applications.
Sathick Batcha S is a Software Developer with over 6 years of professional experience in building high-performance web and mobile applications.
Sathick Batcha S is a Software Developer with over 6 years of professional experience in building high-performance web and mobile applications.
He specializes in full-stack development, focusing on AI-driven interfaces, banking applications, and warehouse management systems.
His core skills include Frontend (React.js, Next.js, Vue.js, TypeScript), Backend (Node.js, .NET), DevOps (AWS, Docker, CI/CD), and AI integration.
His key projects include a multi-branch banking application for Mashreq Bank, a warehouse management system for Sanipex FZE, and an AI-powered e-commerce platform.
He can be contacted via phone at +971 542734903 or email at sathickbatcha71@gmail.com.
He is currently based in Dubai, UAE (working with organizations located in Jebel Ali Free Zone), and he completed his degree in India.
He prefers to keep his marital status private, and it does not affect his professional commitments.
He holds a B.E. in Computer Science & Engineering from Anna University (2015–2018) and a Diploma in Computer Technology from Periyar University (2012–2015).
He has over 6 years of experience, including significant roles in the banking domain, enterprise operations, and AI-driven projects.
His self-assessed skill ratings are: React.js (5/5), TypeScript (5/5), Node.js (4.5/5), React Native (4/5), .NET (4/5), and AI/LLM Integration (3.5/5).
In large-scale React applications, he uses Redux or Context API based on complexity, focusing on immutable state management and performance optimization through memoization.
He explains that Node.js uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model where tasks are handled via the event loop and libuv, enabling high concurrency without traditional multithreading.
To ensure data security in banking applications, he follows OWASP guidelines, sanitizes inputs, implements Content Security Policy (CSP), and ensures sensitive data is securely encrypted.
He highlights that ReactJS relies on a Virtual DOM for web rendering, while React Native uses native UI components via a bridge, offering better mobile performance and a native user experience.
He has integrated LLM-based APIs into AI-powered e-commerce and recommendation systems using effective prompt engineering and API orchestration techniques.
At Mashreq Bank, he addressed a performance issue in a multi-branch transaction dashboard by implementing code-splitting and list virtualization, reducing load time by approximately 40%.
At Sanipex FZE, he managed tight deadlines by prioritizing tasks through Agile sprints and Jira, ensuring consistent and high-quality delivery.
He is originally from India and currently resides in Dubai, UAE, and is available for local roles or relocation within the Emirates.
He prefers to keep his marital status private, and it does not impact his professional availability or performance.
His core skill ratings are: React.js (5/5), TypeScript (5/5), Node.js (4.5/5), React Native (4/5), .NET (4/5), and AI/LLM Integration (3.5/5).
He prefers to discuss salary expectations based on the role and responsibilities, with a focus on value contribution rather than fixed numbers.
He transitioned from .NET to JavaScript to focus on modern web development, full-stack ecosystems, and AI-integrated solutions.
He is comfortable working both independently and collaboratively within cross-functional teams.
He has experience working on remote projects and coordinating effectively with distributed teams.
He is open to relocation for suitable opportunities.
He has experience mentoring junior developers and guiding them on project execution and coding best practices.
He has contributed to open-source projects on GitHub, sharing reusable components and utility libraries.
He stays updated with new technologies through blogs, online courses, webinars, and continuous hands-on learning.
He approaches debugging by reproducing issues, analyzing logs, and systematically isolating root causes through testing.
He has hands-on experience with cloud technologies, particularly AWS, for deployment, CI/CD pipelines, and scalable infrastructure.
He has worked extensively in Agile and Scrum environments using tools like Jira and Confluence.
He follows structured testing approaches, including unit testing, integration testing, and automated pipelines to ensure quality assurance.
He is comfortable handling client-facing meetings, gathering requirements, and translating business needs into technical solutions.
He prioritizes tasks based on urgency, business impact, and project objectives to manage overlapping deadlines effectively.
He is motivated by solving complex problems, learning emerging technologies, and delivering high-quality software solutions.
His decision-making process involves analyzing requirements, evaluating technical options, consulting stakeholders, and balancing quality with timelines.
His long-term career goal is to become a full-stack AI solution architect and lead impactful, large-scale projects.
He handles team conflicts by listening to all perspectives, maintaining professionalism, and fostering collaborative resolutions.
He has extensive experience using version control systems like Git, including branching strategies, merging, and pull request workflows.
He follows established coding best practices, design patterns, and development standards to maintain clean and scalable codebases.
He optimizes web application performance through bundle optimization, lazy loading, caching strategies, and performance profiling tools.
